item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Greetings Iâ€™ve decided to create a site where I can post some of my work, a little about myself, and any thoughts or ideas I have or come across that I think are worth sharing. I hope you find my postings interesting and, if not, at least it will provide a cathartic experience for me.
